articles.author: Alexander Kirk
articles.title: What will Colorado see during the 2024 total solar eclipse? - 9News.com KUSA
articles.description: The path of the 2024 total solar eclipse will cross North America for the first time since 2017. Here's what to know as you plan for April 8.
articles.content:
DENVER The United States is two months away from its first total solar eclipse in seven years.
A total solar eclipse will occur when the moon passes between the Sun and Earth, completely blocking th… [+3801 chars]
